name: TutorMe
description: We're building the a virtual classroom powered by GenAI. For students that struggle with effectively studying for different standardized tests, we built a centralized virtual tutoring center, right now we're focused on the global IB curriculum.
one_liner: We're building the a virtual classroom powered by GenAI. For students that struggle with effectively studying for different standardized tests, we built a centralized virtual tutoring center, right now we're focused on the global IB curriculum.
